comments.body:
Could you add a test for: 
 
ci/latest
ci-cross/latest

here. 

I believe there should be other tests in a different location that are similar.

Do you want to test that when a user specifies `--kubernetes-version ci/latest` and `ci-cross/latest` that the correct CIImageRepository gets set on the config?

If that's the case we should put it under the test for `config.NormalizeKubernetesVersion` function (which I see is only partially tested so I will add a few test cases).

ci/latest and ci-cross/latest will never be the actual k8s version used in this function. By the time this function gets called it's already been resolved to some long version string as dictated by the `config.KubernetesReleaseVersion` function.

That function is well tested, but there's a bunch of cleanup that will need to happen to make the test you're suggesting be useful, specifically https://github.com/kubernetes/kubeadm/issues/902.
I'm ok with manual verification that the two targets translate correctly right now, but we need todo the cleanup work in 1.12 then.
